mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AEMMNTRNG ( STUDY_ID ,PRTCPNT_ID ,SUMRY_SEQ ,MNTRNG_SEQ ,REVISN_NO ,MEDDRA_CODE ,AE_TERM_CTCAE ,AE_TERM_OTHER ,AE_GRADE ,AE_STRT_DE ,AE_END_DE ,MNTRNG_MEMO ,MNTRNG_REGIST_DE ,VISIT_RESVE_DE ,SAE_AT ,SAE_DEATH ,SAE_LIFE_THRT ,SAE_HSPTLZ_NEED ,SAE_CSMALFNC ,SAE_CSDEFORM ,SAE_ETC_SITTN ,CAUSALITY_CODE ,PREDICT_AT ,AE_ACTION_CODE ,ETC_ACTION_CODE ,MEDCIN_STOP_DE ,ACTION_DE ,AE_RSLT_CODE ,ACTION_MEMO ,FRST_REGISTER_ID ,LAST_UPDUSR_ID ,ACTION_DCSN_AT ,ACTION_DCSN_ESNTL_ID ,MNTRNG_DCSN_AT ,MNTRNG_DCSN_ESNTL_ID ) VALUES ( #{studyId} ,#{prtcpntId} ,#{sumrySeq} ,(SELECT ifnull((MAX(TS.REVISN_NO) + 1 ), 1) FROM AEMMNTRNG TS WHERE TS.STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND TS.PRTCPNT_ID = #{prtcpntId} AND TS.SUMRY_SEQ = #{sumrySeq}) ,(SELECT ifnull((MAX(TS.REVISN_NO) + 1 ), 1) FROM AEMMNTRNG TS WHERE TS.STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND TS.PRTCPNT_ID = #{prtcpntId} AND TS.SUMRY_SEQ = #{sumrySeq}) ,NULLIF(#{medDraCode}, '') ,NULLIF(#{aeTermCtcae}, '') ,NULLIF(#{aeTermOther}, '') ,NULLIF(#{aeGrade}, '') ,now() ,now() ,NULLIF(#{mntrngMemo}, '') ,STR_TO_DATE(replace(NULLIF(#{mntrngRegistDe}, ''), '-',''), '%Y%m%d') ,STR_TO_DATE(replace(NULLIF(#{visitResveDe}, ''), '-',''), '%Y%m%d') ,NULLIF(#{saeAt}, '') ,NULLIF(#{saeDeath}, '') ,NULLIF(#{saeLifeThrt}, '') ,NULLIF(#{saeHsptlzNeed}, '') ,NULLIF(#{saeCsmalfnc}, '') ,NULLIF(#{saeCsdeform}, '') ,NULLIF(#{saeEtcSittn}, '') ,NULLIF(#{causalityCode}, '') ,NULLIF(#{predictAt}, '') ,NULLIF(#{aeActionCode}, '') ,NULLIF(#{etcActionCode}, '') ,STR_TO_DATE(replace(NULLIF(#{medcinStopDe}, ''), '-',''), '%Y%m%d') ,STR_TO_DATE(replace(NULLIF(#{actionDe}, ''), '-',''), '%Y%m%d') ,NULLIF(#{aeRsltCode}, '') ,#{actionMemo} ,#{frstRegisterId} ,#{lastUpdusrId} ,IFNULL(#{actionDcsnAt}, 'N') ,#{actionDcsnEsntlId} ,IFNULL(#{mntrngDcsnAt}, 'N') ,#{mntrngDcsnEsntlId} )

INSERT INTO AEMSUMRY ( STUDY_ID ,PRTCPNT_ID ,SUMRY_SEQ ,AE_NO ,MEDDRA_CODE ,AE_TERM_CTCAE ,AE_TERM_OTHER ,AE_GRADE ,AE_STRT_DE ,AE_END_DE ,MNTRNG_MEMO ,MNTRNG_REGIST_DE ,VISIT_RESVE_DE ,SAE_AT ,SAE_DEATH ,SAE_LIFE_THRT ,SAE_HSPTLZ_NEED ,SAE_CSMALFNC ,SAE_CSDEFORM ,SAE_ETC_SITTN ,CAUSALITY_CODE ,PREDICT_AT ,AE_ACTION_CODE ,ETC_ACTION_CODE ,MEDCIN_STOP_DE ,ACTION_DE ,AE_RSLT_CODE ,ACTION_MEMO ,FRST_REGISTER_ID ,LAST_UPDUSR_ID ) VALUES ( #{studyId} ,#{prtcpntId} ,(SELECT ifnull((MAX(TS.AE_NO) + 1 ), 1) FROM AEMSUMRY TS WHERE TS.STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND TS.PRTCPNT_ID = #{prtcpntId}) ,(SELECT ifnull((MAX(TS.AE_NO) + 1 ), 1) FROM AEMSUMRY TS WHERE TS.STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND TS.PRTCPNT_ID = #{prtcpntId}) ,NULLIF(#{medDraCode}, '') ,NULLIF(#{aeTermCtcae}, '') ,NULLIF(#{aeTermOther}, '') ,NULLIF(#{aeGrade}, '') ,now() ,now() ,NULLIF(#{mntrngMemo}, '') ,STR_TO_DATE(replace(NULLIF(#{mntrngRegistDe}, ''), '-',''), '%Y%m%d') ,STR_TO_DATE(replace(NULLIF(#{visitResveDe}, ''), '-',''), '%Y%m%d') ,NULLIF(#{saeAt}, '') ,NULLIF(#{saeDeath}, '') ,NULLIF(#{saeLifeThrt}, '') ,NULLIF(#{saeHsptlzNeed}, '') ,NULLIF(#{saeCsmalfnc}, '') ,NULLIF(#{saeCsdeform}, '') ,NULLIF(#{saeEtcSittn}, '') ,NULLIF(#{causalityCode}, '') ,NULLIF(#{predictAt}, '') ,NULLIF(#{aeActionCode}, '') ,NULLIF(#{etcActionCode}, '') ,STR_TO_DATE(replace(NULLIF(#{medcinStopDe}, ''), '-',''), '%Y%m%d') ,STR_TO_DATE(replace(NULLIF(#{actionDe}, ''), '-',''), '%Y%m%d') ,NULLIF(#{aeRsltCode}, '') ,#{actionMemo} ,#{frstRegisterId} ,#{lastUpdusrId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE AEMSUMRY SET MEDDRA_CODE = NULLIF(#{medDraCode}, '') ,AE_TERM_CTCAE = NULLIF(#{aeTermCtcae}, '') ,AE_TERM_OTHER = NULLIF(#{aeTermOther}, '') ,AE_GRADE = NULLIF(#{aeGrade}, '') ,AE_STRT_DE = now() ,AE_END_DE = now() ,MNTRNG_MEMO = NULLIF(#{mntrngMemo}, '') ,MNTRNG_REGIST_DE = STR_TO_DATE(replace(NULLIF(#{mntrngRegistDe}, ''), '-',''), '%Y%m%d') ,VISIT_RESVE_DE = STR_TO_DATE(replace(NULLIF(#{visitResveDe}, ''), '-',''), '%Y%m%d') ,SAE_AT = NULLIF(#{saeAt}, '') ,SAE_DEATH = NULLIF(#{saeDeath}, '') ,SAE_LIFE_THRT = NULLIF(#{saeLifeThrt}, '') ,SAE_HSPTLZ_NEED = NULLIF(#{saeHsptlzNeed}, '') ,SAE_CSMALFNC = NULLIF(#{saeCsmalfnc}, '') ,SAE_CSDEFORM = NULLIF(#{saeCsdeform}, '') ,SAE_ETC_SITTN = NULLIF(#{saeEtcSittn}, '') ,CAUSALITY_CODE = NULLIF(#{causalityCode}, '') ,PREDICT_AT = NULLIF(#{predictAt}, '') ,AE_ACTION_CODE = NULLIF(#{aeActionCode}, '') ,ETC_ACTION_CODE = NULLIF(#{etcActionCode}, '') ,MEDCIN_STOP_DE = STR_TO_DATE(replace(NULLIF(#{medcinStopDe}, ''), '-',''), '%Y%m%d') ,ACTION_DE = STR_TO_DATE(replace(NULLIF(#{actionDe}, ''), '-',''), '%Y%m%d') ,AE_RSLT_CODE = NULLIF(#{aeRsltCode}, '') ,ACTION_MEMO = #{actionMemo} ,FRST_REGISTER_ID = #{frstRegisterId} ,LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} ,USE_YN = IFNULL(#{useYn}, 'Y') ,ACTION_DCSN_AT = IFNULL(#{actionDcsnAt}, 'N') ,ACTION_DCSN_ESNTL_ID = #{actionDcsnEsntlId} ,MNTRNG_DCSN_AT = IFNULL(#{mntrngDcsnAt}, 'N') ,MNTRNG_DCSN_ESNTL_ID = #{mntrngDcsnEsntlId} WHERE STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND PRTCPNT_ID = #{prtcpntId} AND SUMRY_SEQ = #{sumrySeq}
mapper.select: SELECT SETUPITEM_CODE AS setupitemCode ,CASE WHEN SETUPITEM_CODE = 'FILE_UPLOAD_EXT' THEN LOWER(SETUPITEM_VAL) ELSE SETUPITEM_VAL END AS setupitemVal ,SETUPITEM_DC AS setupitemDc ,SETUPITEM_ETCINFO AS setupitemEtcinfo FROM SYSSETUP WHERE SETUPITEM_GRP = 'CMM'

SELECT ATCH_FILE_ID, FILE_CN, FILE_SN, FILE_STRE_COURS, STRE_FILE_NM, FILE_EXTSN, ORIGNL_FILE_NM, FILE_SIZE, SORT_ORDR, SORT_ORDR AS OLD_SORT_ORDR, ENCRYPT_VAL, IFNULL(STR_TO_DATE(LEFT(RIGHT(STRE_FILE_NM,17),12),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), (SELECT M.CREAT_DT FROM COMTNFILE M WHERE M.ATCH_FILE_ID = COMTNFILEDETAIL.ATCH_FILE_ID)) CREAT_DT FROM COMTNFILEDETAIL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId} ORDER BY SORT_ORDR ASC, FILE_SN ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AEMPRTCPNTSYMPTMS ( STUDY_ID ,PRTCPNT_ID ,SYMPTMS_SEQ ,SYMPTMS_REGTYPE_CODE ,SYMPTMS_TITLE ,SYMPTMS_CONFIRM ,CALL_PARTNER ,SYMPTMS_CN ,SYMPTMS_REGIST_DE ,SYMPTMS_STRTDE ,FRST_REGISTER_ID ,LAST_UPDUSR_ID ) VALUES ( #{studyId} ,#{prtcpntId} ,GET_NEXT_SYMPTMS_SEQ(#{studyId}, #{prtcpntId}) ,#{symptmsRegtypeCode} ,'NO TITLE' ,IFNULL(#{symptmsConfirm}, 'N') ,IFNULL(#{callPartner}, '') ,IFNULL(#{symptmsCn}, '') ,STR_TO_DATE(IFNULL(#{symptmsRegistDe}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d')), '%Y%m%d') ,STR_TO_DATE(IFNULL(#{symptmsRegistDe}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d')), '%Y%m%d') ,#{frstRegisterId} ,#{lastUpdusrId} )
mapper.select: SELECT TPS.STUDY_ID AS studyId, TPS.PRTCPNT_ID AS prtcpntId, TPS.SYMPTMS_SEQ AS symptmsSeq, TPS.SYMPTMS_REGTYPE_CODE AS symptmsRegtypeCode, DATE_FORMAT(TPS.SYMPTMS_REGIST_DE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS symptmsRegistDe, TPS.SYMPTMS_TITLE AS symptmsTitle, DATE_FORMAT(TPS.SYMPTMS_STRTDE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS symptmsStrtDe, DATE_FORMAT(TPS.SYMPTMS_ENDDE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS symptmsEndDe, CONCAT_WS('~',DATE_FORMAT(TPS.SYMPTMS_STRTDE, '%Y-%m-%d'), IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(TPS.SYMPTMS_ENDDE, '%Y-%m-%d'),'')) AS symptmsDe, TPS.SYMPTMS_CN AS symptmsCn, TPS.ATCH_FILE_ID AS atchFileId, TPS.OUTBND_CALL_AT AS outbndCallAt, TPS.CALL_PARTNER AS callPartner, TPS.VISIT_TYPE_CODE AS visitTypeCode, TPS.VISITRULE_SEQ AS visitRuleSeq, (SELECT TRMT_STEP FROM AEMVISITRULE TVR WHERE TVR.STUDY_ID = TPS.STUDY_ID AND TVR.VISITRULE_SEQ = TPS.VISITRULE_SEQ) AS trmtStep, (SELECT TU.USER_NM FROM COMTNUSERINFO TU WHERE TU.ESNTL_ID = TPS.FRST_REGISTER_ID) AS registerNm, IF(T1.CNT > 0, 'Y', 'N') AS useAt, SYMPTMS_CONFIRM AS symptmsConfirm FROM AEMPRTCPNTSYMPTMS TPS LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TMS.STUDY_ID, TMS.PRTCPNT_ID, TMS.SYMPTMS_SEQ, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM AEMMNTRNGSYMPTMS TMS GROUP BY TMS.STUDY_ID, TMS.PRTCPNT_ID, TMS.SYMPTMS_SEQ) T1 ON TPS.STUDY_ID = T1.STUDY_ID AND TPS.PRTCPNT_ID = T1.PRTCPNT_ID AND TPS.SYMPTMS_SEQ = T1.SYMPTMS_SEQ WHERE TPS.STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND TPS.PRTCPNT_ID = #{prtcpntId} AND TPS.SYMPTMS_SEQ = #{symptmsSeq}

SELECT TSJ.STUDY_ID AS studyId , TSJ.PRTCPNT_ID AS prtcpntId , TSJ.SUMRY_SEQ AS sumrySeq , IFNULL(TSJ.MNTRNG_DCSN_AT, 'N') AS mntrngDcsnAt , IFNULL(TSJ.ACTION_DCSN_AT, 'N') AS actionDcsnAt , CONCAT('[',CONCAT_WS('][', CONCAT('',TSJ.ae_term_ctcae) , IFNULL(TGD.CODE_NM,'-') , IF(TSJ.MNTRNG_DCSN_AT='Y','모니터링확정','모니터링미확정') , IF(TSJ.ACTION_DCSN_AT='Y','ongoing','---') ),']') AS treeItem FROM AEMSUMRY TSJ LEFT JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE TGD ON TGD.CODE_ID = 'AEM009' AND TGD.CODE = TSJ.AE_GRADE WHERE TSJ.STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND TSJ.PRTCPNT_ID = #{prtcpntId} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY ACTION_DCSN_AT DESC, MNTRNG_DCSN_AT DESC, SUMRY_SEQ

SELECT studyId, prtcpntId, enrlNo, initial ,CONCAT(symptmsCnt,' ',IF(visitScheduledDe1 IS NOT NULL,'방문','')) AS newSymptms ,sexdstnCode, telno, birthday, pcnAppId ,IFNULL(visitScheduledDe1, visitScheduledDe2) AS visitForecastDe ,cnfrmrNm ,DATE_FORMAT(regDt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS regDt FROM ( SELECT TD.STUDY_ID AS studyid , TD.PRTCPNT_ID AS prtcpntId , TD.ENRL_NO AS enrlNo , TP.INITIAL AS initial , CONCAT(IFNULL(TS.CONFIRM,0),'(',IFNULL(TS.SCNTALL,0),')') AS symptmsCnt , TP.SEXDSTN_CODE AS sexdstnCode , TP.TELNO AS telno , CONCAT_WS('-', LPAD(TP.BRTHDY_YEAR, 4, '0'), LPAD(TP.BRTHDY_MONTH, 2, '0'), LPAD(IFNULL(TP.BRTHDY_DATE,''), 2, '0')) AS birthday , TP.PCN_APP_ID AS pcnAppId , (SELECT MIN(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(TD.MDCTN_STRTDE, INTERVAL TVS.TERM_DAYS DAY), '%Y%m%d')) FROM AEMVISITRULE TVS WHERE STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND DATEDIFF(DATE(NOW()), TD.MDCTN_STRTDE) BETWEEN (TERM_DAYS - ALWNC_DAYS) AND (TERM_DAYS + ALWNC_DAYS) ) AS visitScheduledDe1 , TU.USER_NM AS cnfrmrNm , (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(MIN(DATE_ADD(TD.MDCTN_STRTDE, INTERVAL TVS.TERM_DAYS DAY)), '%Y%m%d') FROM AEMVISITRULE TVS WHERE STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND DATE_ADD(TD.MDCTN_STRTDE, INTERVAL TVS.TERM_DAYS DAY) > IFNULL(LAST_VISITDE, NOW()) ) AS visitScheduledDe2 , TS.regDt FROM AEMSTDYPRTCPNT TD JOIN AEMPRTCPNT TP ON TP.PRTCPNT_ID = TD.PRTCPNT_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT PRTCPNT_ID , SUM(IF(DATE_FORMAT(SYMPTMS_REGIST_DE, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN IFNULL(NULLIF(#{startDe},''),'00000000') AND IFNULL(NULLIF(#{endDe},''),'99991231'), 1,0)) AS SCNT , SUM(IF(SYMPTMS_CONFIRM = 'N', 1, 0)) AS CONFIRM , COUNT(*) AS SCNTALL , MAX(SYMPTMS_REGIST_DE) AS regDt FROM AEMPRTCPNTSYMPTMS TPS WHERE STUDY_ID = #{studyId} GROUP BY PRTCPNT_ID ) TS ON TS.PRTCPNT_ID = TD.PRTCPNT_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT PRTCPNT_ID, MAX(SYMPTMS_STRTDE) AS LAST_VISITDE FROM AEMPRTCPNTSYMPTMS WHERE STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND SYMPTMS_REGTYPE_CODE = '400' GROUP BY PRTCPNT_ID ) TV ON TV.PRTCPNT_ID = TD.PRTCPNT_ID LEFT JOIN COMTNUSERINFO TU ON TU.ESNTL_ID = TD.CNFRMR_ESNTL_ID WHERE TD.STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND TD.STDYINST_ID = #{stdyInstId} AND TD.PRTCPNT_END_CODE IS NULL AND TD.CNFRMR_ESNTL_ID IS NOT NULL AND TD.MDCTN_STRTDE IS NOT NULL
AND TP.INITIAL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND TP.TELNO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND TP.PCN_APP_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
) TDATA WHERE 1=1
AND NOT(symptmsCnt IS NULL AND visitScheduledDe1 IS NULL) /* 전체일 경우 블럭 */
AND visitScheduledDe1 IS NOT NULL /* 오늘방문예정일 경우 */
ORDER BY regDt desc, enrlNo
